channel.title: BioScape - PKing 101 [24/7][VPS][WEBCLIENT]
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2d6p3cm.png[/img]
This probably isn't as old school as most of you know, pre-2007. This is pretty old though considering what is now up and running. I use to run this server in 09/10 and it usually had around 300+ online. It was pretty huge on RL's toplist and had a good thing going until [I]shit just happened.[/I] It averages around 10-20 online and is pretty community oriented. The only people that play right are all vets that played back then. If you're looking for a new, sorta old, and a close community then this is probably a good choice for you. The newest thing you will find is dragon claws, skillcape emotes, and that's pretty much it. This won't always remain old as times goes on, but I won't add any extremely new content. The only thing that will be added is a fewer newer items, npcs, and just updates on older content. I don't want this to be known as some shitty, buggy, and poorly ran 600+ server. Thanks for reading and hope you give it a try :p
The owners are Bizerk, Adam, and Ballin. I'm just posting this on here as a member of the server :)
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/6sc3eh.jpg[/img] [URL=http://bioscape.info]Forums[/URL] -------------------- [img]http://i34.tinypic.com/zvvkao.jpg[/img] [URL=http://bioscape.info/index.php?page=webclient]Webclient[/URL] [img]http://i34.tinypic.com/zvvkao.jpg[/img] [URL=http://bioscape.info/dlclient.zip]Desktop Client[/URL]
Some old YouTube videos: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JEb0P8YTErw]Duo Pk Vid|Ix Desire Xi|Stop drop k0|AGS SPECS|Nice risk's|Bioscape - YouTube[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=opwxJafP3KE]"They all run"|High SPECS|AMAZING LOOT|EXTREME RISK|Cody's 2ND PK VID - YouTube[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hKgNj0SBpSk]Cody's First Pk vid|DH Pking|DDS SPECS|30M+ LOOT - YouTube[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dz2LtcMBrNM]BioScape Advertisement Video - YouTube[/url]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uSuS4.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LZN2H.png[/img][/CENTER]

Pokemon seems like a nice person, I doubt he would advertise.

Also, what your server could do to make your self more professional is to have taken this minor argument to pm. I mean, let’s be honest nobody reading this thread wants to see a huge argument about abuse. It can’t be good for the server.

item.title: BioScape - PKing 101 [24/7][VPS][WEBCLIENT]
item.dc:creator: @Jayy_Yo Jayy Yo
item.description:
@Jayy_Yo wrote:

[quote=“Unleashed Revolution, post:13, topic:450693”][quote author=pokemonn link=topic=553573.msg4056065#msg4056065 date=1342974754]

good to know your selling staff spots… and i should be having a lawsuite on you for “bullying” calling me a Nig*** was offensive

Where does it say we’re selling staff spots? Lmfao, not my fault no one wanted to go to your shit server.

Whats funny is i was not even advertising… i said the words “who likes 2006 remakes” and everyone was saying ahh get off 06scape and isaid " no im not 06scape there shit" then i pmed someone name dodge something and talked to him about donations and he called me the N word, i went to complain nd then i got iped for no reason? since when is having a name advertising? (my ig name was redone)

I’m a admin on the server.

  1. You were advertising a RS2 remake and had the name of the one you were advertising. I’d post it but its censored to say ‘google’ here.
  2. You tried to act smart and ask why people were calling you names when it was very obvious. Would you like if it if I spammed your server?

You were ipbanned because of the advertising because it was obvious that was the only thing you were there for. Don’t try to give the server a bad rep when the owners have logs of this going on.

whats funny is i did not advertise to ANYONE having a name that symbolizes that i like remakes is not advertising sir, all i simply asked was if someone liked remakes. then i get called the N word and iped. if i had pictures before you iped me i would have called my lawyer.
[/quote]
Better yet, what would a lawyer do? Please realize what you’re doing and playing.[/quote]
This.

Read full topic

Where does it say we’re selling staff spots? Lmfao, not my fault no one wanted to go to your shit server.

I believe if you take part of wanting to advertise for another person rather let him do it himself, you attempt to do it correctly and give the community a good-name, from what I can see from your post, I don’t think you’re doing just that, actually I would think it would resemble a “shit” community as you are attempting to say about his “server”.

Anyway, I’m not here to do that, good luck again, just learn to respect others when doing something like this.

item.title: BioScape - PKing 101 [24/7][VPS][WEBCLIENT]
item.dc:creator: @Jayy_Yo Jayy Yo
item.description:
@Jayy_Yo wrote:

[CENTER]

2d6p3cm.png968×175

This probably isn’t as old school as most of you know, pre-2007. This is pretty old though considering what is now up and running. I use to run this server in 09/10 and it usually had around 300+ online. It was pretty huge on RL’s toplist and had a good thing going until shit just happened. It averages around 10-20 online and is pretty community oriented. The only people that play right are all vets that played back then. If you’re looking for a new, sorta old, and a close community then this is probably a good choice for you. The newest thing you will find is dragon claws, skillcape emotes, and that’s pretty much it. This won’t always remain old as times goes on, but I won’t add any extremely new content. The only thing that will be added is a fewer newer items, npcs, and just updates on older content. I don’t want this to be known as some shitty, buggy, and poorly ran 600+ server. Thanks for reading and hope you give it a try

The owners are Bizerk, Adam, and Ballin. I’m just posting this on here as a member of the server

Forums

Webclient
Desktop Client

Some old YouTube videos:
Duo Pk Vid|Ix Desire Xi|Stop drop k0|AGS SPECS|Nice risk’s|Bioscape - YouTube
“They all run”|High SPECS|AMAZING LOOT|EXTREME RISK|Cody’s 2ND PK VID - YouTube
Cody’s First Pk vid|DH Pking|DDS SPECS|30M+ LOOT - YouTube
BioScape Advertisement Video - YouTube

uSuS4.png936×574
[/CENTER]

Read full topic
